content: this crochet sunflower earrings pattern is free you can easily make these cute earrings for you and yours written using u s terminology and even though the crochet level required is intermediate a beginner can attempt it happy crocheting materials needed 1 25mm hook size 10 cotton crochet thread yellow and brown or natural or black stitch marker yarning needle pair of earring hooks scissors pliers size one size 4cm x 4cm
